alert.note: Alert for Boone; Gallatin; Owen (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 2:43PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF EAST CENTRAL SWITZERLAND, SOUTH CENTRAL BOONE, NORTHWESTERN GRANT, NORTH CENTRAL OWEN AND GALLATIN COUNTIES THROUGH 315 PM EDT... At 243 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located over Kentucky Speedway, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Crittenden, Warsaw, Kentucky Speedway, Florence, Glencoe, Sparta, Patriot, Munk, Ryle, Steele Bottom, Eagle Hill, Napoleon, Verona, Egypt Bottom and Elliston. This includes I-71 in Kentucky between mile markers 54 and 73. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for southeastern Indiana...and northern Kentucky. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
